title: Deep Impact THE_NAKAII
description: End of the world scenario. Wayward comet menaces Earth with planet-wide destruction. Good action. Robert Duvall and Tia Leoni, Vanessa Redgrave. Captured footage from VHS format tape usinge Pinnacle Dazzle device and my VHS player. Ran captured AVI files thru a converter to get the DVD files. then thru DVD Shrink to reauthor it and lastly burnt it to DVD-R disc using Nero 7. This upload is the DVD output video from Shrink. All you have to do is use your favorite burning suite and burn these reauthored video files to DVD-R blank media. I prefer Nero 7.  Have PHUN!!
